features: Very Important: After installing the protector, you need to Re-Record Fingerprints[Very important][Very important]. In this way, you will get a perfect fingerprint unlock and super fast. The Ferilinso bundle includes: [4 Pack Glass Screen Protector & 4 Pack Camera Protector for S24] [Includes mounting frame and cleaning kit].

Provide the Strongest Protection: Different from the ordinary 9H tempered film in the market. Ferilinso's glass made with aerospace-grade glass and fuses nano-ceramics into the glass screen protector (Awarded SGS Certification), providing 10X stronger protection than normal glass for superior resistance to damage caused by scratches, bumps, and drops in daily use. Effectively shock resistance screen can help you save unnecessary and expensive repairs.

Ultra HD & Original Touch: Adopting exclusive coating technology increases the transmittance of the glass, providing maximum optical clarity. The ultra-clear ensures comfortable extended use without causing eye strain. Even more special...Our glass innovatively applied a 9th gen oleophobic nano coating (top-notch skin-friendly), effectively reduces fingerprints and oil residue by 98% to make it Smoother than the original screen! (watch the video to walk into Ferilinso lab tests)

Camera Protector & Case-Friendly: Ferilinso lens protector made of 9H+ glass effectively protect entire lens from drops, Scratches And not easy to fall off. Special designed Black circle compatible night shooting function, Clearly capture every moment, without distortion or obstruction, completely maintain the original beauty of photos and videos. We care about every detail, this camera and screen protector designed to be compatible with 99% cases.

Face ID Compatible & Easy To Install: Precisely Cut for Samsung S24 6.2'', so this tempered glass is perfectly compatible with Face ID feature. Comes with precision installation frame and complete cleaning kit, to make it easy for you to achieve a flawless application with no bubbles. We are committed to providing good service to every customer, whatever problems, you can send us information through Amazon's Message Center, We will provide you with satisfactory service within 24 Hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, good value
reviews.reviewText: Used these on a couple new S24 phones. Easy install and works fine with phone cases. Make sure to watch the installation video, since it shows how to get rid of air bubbles. Had bubbles in both installations, but very easy to get rid of them. Seller sent some updated instructions pertaining to the fingerprint reader, which worked out fine. Didn't read fingerprints quite as well as before the installation, but that's to be expected with any screen protector. Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars S24 Ultra easy to apply
reviews.reviewText: Bought this thinking it was going to feel cheap but would provide some protection in the meantime while I find a better one. I was way off, this screen protector feels like it is going to protect my phone. Finger's do not stick to the screen it glides smoothly. Does not have any issues with the in screen finger print reader at all. Will for sure need to go settings and apply the screen sensitivity that the phone comes with for screen protectors. Not only does it feel durable but it also comes with a easy to apply tool that is very helpful and bonus you get 4 total screens. I highly recommend this product, I currently have UAG case on my phone and the screen protector does not hit the case, perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. Easy to install with template.
reviews.reviewText: I love how the screen saver "attaches itself to the phone screen". By this I mean, that you set it in the plastic template provided and watch it adhere to the phone's screen. On our 2 new Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus phones, I had no issues with bubbles. I watched a video from the Mfg. on how to get any bubbles out if they occur but I didn't have but 1 or 2 and just lifting up the closed edge, and letting it back down, all the bubbles were removed. I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the glass, it's easy to install, but be careful. Sadly, I received the package with 1 glass broken. I suppose that could have happened in the shipping process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit on S24+ screen
reviews.reviewText: Works on my new S24+ screen. Fingerprint scanner still works, doesn't bump my case(ringke), no bubbles, easy install. One showed up broken and I didn't try to use the camera glasses, but at 8 bucks, performing as well as whitestone $50 two packs I'm used to on my Note 20, this is a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Face protector good, camera protector not so good
reviews.reviewText: Good thing they give you 4 of them. The first one I tried had some defects on it, not allowing it to fully adhere to the phone. The second one worked great. I tried putting the camera protector on as well but it wouldn't stay on. I'd stick it on, and it'd slowly just fall right back off. So for now I'm leaving it off since I have a phone case that helps protect the camera a little bit. Overall I'd probably not buy again, doesn't seem like the quality is on point. For the price, it's probably ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits as expected and easy installation. 4 screen protector and 4 camera covers. What more do you expect for that price. 5 stars rating for this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Flawless Fingerprint Recognition on My S24 Ultra
reviews.reviewText: When the package from Amazon arrived, it was damaged. I promptly reached out to customer service, and they efficiently sent me a replacement. Installing the screen protector was a breeze, and I encountered no issues with bubbles underneath. Following the installation, I activated touch sensitivity in the settings of my S24 Ultra and registered my fingerprints. I'm pleased to report that my S24 Ultra now recognizes my fingerprints without any problems.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegaron 3 protectores no 5 como dice en la descripción

reviews.reviewText: Buen material y trae varios de repuesto
Presi e sono rimasta molto contentaSono resistenti e facili da applicare

Dieses Panzerglas habe ich jetzt nochmals bestellt. Aber nicht wegen des Displayschutzes, sonder wegen der Kamera. Der Displayschutz selbst, saugt sich sauber an die Oberfläche an. Die Funktionalität des Touchscreens als auch des Fingerabdruckleser war überhaupt nicht beeinträchtigt, sind reagierten sofort.Der Kameraschutz ging mir leider gleich zweimal kaputt, er hat aber die Linsen zuverlässig geschützt und ist leicht aufzubringen. Leider ist er von diesem Hersteller nicht einzeln erhältlich.Für mich aber dennoch eine klare Kaufempfehlung.
